title: How to Disable Autoplay on the Home Screen on YouTube

steps.title: Launch the “YouTube” app on your Android device.
steps.content: Launch the “YouTube” app on your Android device. You can find the app in your app drawer. Ensure that your app is up to date. If it's not, update it from the Play Store .

steps.title: Tap on your account icon.
steps.content: Tap on your account icon. It's located at the top-right corner of the app.

steps.title: Tap on Settings.
steps.content: Tap on Settings . It will be the second to last option.

steps.title: Select the General option.
steps.content: Select the General option. It's the first option.

steps.title: Tap on Muted playback in feeds.
steps.content: Tap on Muted playback in feeds . A dialog box will pop up on your screen.

steps.title: Select the Off option to disable the feature.
steps.content: Select the Off option to disable the feature. When you're done, YouTube videos won't autoplay on the Home and subscription tab. If you want to turn on the feature again, choose Always on from the same settings. That's it!
